column5: Police in collaboration with the Ministry of Interior went to a condominium (*Zong Ruby?)
column6: for some issue to do with a 55-year-old Korean-born business owner.------Local police said in the operation
column8: they detained four Nigerians (*three pictured) in connection with crimes (*says kidnapping
column9: but could be onine fraud) in Vietnam.------Materials including 3 passports
column10: 4 laptops and 8 cell phones.------The four suspects were referred to the Criminal Police Department for further proceedings. ------POST NEWS
